greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Even triangle !n. This table read by rows gives the coefficients of sum formulas of n-th Left factorials (A003422). The k-th row (6>=k>=1) contains T(i,k) for i=1 to k+2, where k=[2*n+1+(-1)^(n-1)]/4 and T(i,k) satisfies !n = Sum_{i=1..k+2} T(i,k) * n^(i-1) / (2*k-2)!.
comment: The sum of signed coefficients for each k-th row is divisible by (2*k-2)!. Moreover, another variant (but an incomplete one, and sorted differently) of the above sequence is presented in A101752.
example: !11=4037914; substituting n=11 in the formula of the k-th row we obtain k=6 and the coefficients T(i,6) are those needed for computing !11.
results.author: _André F. Labossière_, Jan 07 2005
